import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import Navbar from "../../components/Navbar"; import { testApi } from "../../apis/Api"; const Homepage = () => { const [interval, setInterval] = useState(2000); // Initial interval set to 2000ms (2 seconds) // Function to handle the interval change const handleIntervalChange = (e) => { const newInterval = e.target.value * 1000; // Convert seconds to milliseconds setInterval(newInterval); // Update the carousel interval document.querySelector('#carouselExampleAutoplaying').setAttribute('data-bs-interval', newInterval); }; return ( <>
); } export default Homepage;
